rules: Rule1: Whenever credit worthiness is evaluated, the loan application is approved.
Rule2: Either documentation is waived or, if a risk assessment is performed, then credit worthiness is evaluated.
Rule3: Should the credit report be submitted, the background check is completed.
Rule4: If fraud is detected, then it is not the case that legal proceedings are initiated.
Rule5: Provided that the regulatory body is reported, fraud is detected.
Rule6: If the background check is completed, then a risk assessment is performed.
Rule7: Either the income documents are verified or the employment history is verified.
Rule8: If the employment history is verified, then, if the background check is completed, the loan application is approved.
Rule9: In the event that the compliance requirements are reviewed, then, provided that the background check is completed, the loan application is approved.
Rule10: If the regulatory framework is required, then, should the income documents be verified, the compliance requirements are reviewed.
Rule11: If it is not the case that, if the financial transaction is authorized, then, if the financial product is not available, the payment is not processed, then suspicious activity is flagged.

Rule12: If it is not the case that, if it is not the case that either the investment product is approved or the financial product is available, then the loan application is rejected, then legal proceedings are initiated.

Rule13: If it is not the case that, if it is not the case that, if it is not the case that either the investment product is approved or the financial product is available, then the loan application is rejected, then the regulatory body is reported, then the decision is appealed.

Rule14: Provided that it is not the case that, if it is not the case that, if it is not the case that either the investment product is approved or the financial product is available, then the loan application is rejected, then the regulatory body is reported, then it is not the case that the decision is appealed.

Rule15: If it is not the case that, if it is not the case that, if it is not the case that either the investment product is approved or the financial product is available, then the loan application is rejected, then it is not the case that legal proceedings are initiated, then the compliance issue is resolved.

Rule16: If it is not the case that, if it is not the case that, if the financial product is not available, then the payment is not processed, then the account is suspended, then employment is terminated.

Rule17: Provided that it is not the case that, if it is not the case that, if the financial product is not available, then the payment is not processed, then the account is suspended, then it is not the case that employment is terminated.
Rule18: In the event that it is not the case that, if the financial product is not available, then the payment is not processed, then it is not the case that the account is suspended.
Rule19: Should the financial product not be available, the credit report is submitted.
Rule20: Provided that the financial product is not available, the payment is processed.
facts: Fact1: The regulatory framework is required.
Fact2: The financial transaction is authorized.
Fact3: It is not the case that the loan application is approved.
Fact4: It is not the case that suspicious activity is flagged.
Fact5: It is not the case that the investment product is approved.
Fact6: It is not the case that the loan application is rejected.
Fact7: It is not the case that the compliance issue is resolved.
Fact8: It is not the case that documentation is waived.
